languages.text: {n}Невольники, над которыми была проведена процедура мозгового иссечения, утратили тягу к насилию и подстрекательству, найдя тихое удовольствие в монотонной работе и отсутствии общения с окружающими. Надзиратели отметили, что опыт был в высшей степени успешен.{/n}

{n}The convicts who had their brains excised lost any urge to cause violence and provoke others. Now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and lack of communication with other people. The overseers note that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Невольники, над которыми была проведена процедура мозгового иссечения, утратили тягу к насилию и подстрекательству, найдя тихое удовольствие в монотонной работе и отсутствии общения с окружающими. Надзиратели отметили, что опыт был в высшей степени успешен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The slaves who have had their brains dissected have lost their urge to cause violence and incite others, and now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and the lack of communication with other people. The officers noted that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些囚犯的大脑被解剖，之后失去了所有制造暴力与挑衅他人的冲动。如今，他们在单调的工作与独处之中找到了安静的乐趣。所有监察员都注意到，这样的实验取得了极大成功。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The convicts who had their brains excised lost any urge to cause violence and provoke others. Now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and lack of communication with other people. The overseers note that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些囚犯的大脑被解剖，之后失去了所有制造暴力与挑衅他人的冲动。如今，他们在单调的工作与独处之中找到了安静的乐趣。所有监察员都注意到，这样的实验取得了极大成功。{/n}
{n}那些囚犯的大脑被解剖，之后失去了所有制造暴力与挑衅他人的冲动。如今，他们在单调的工作与独处之中找到了安静的乐趣。所有监察员都注意到，这样的实验取得了极大成功。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los convictos a los que se extirpó parte del cerebro perdieron todo impulso de usar la violencia y provocar a los demás. Ahora encuentran un placer silencioso en el trabajo monótono y la carencia de comunicación con otras personas. Los supervisores consideran el experimento un gran éxito.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The convicts who had their brains excised lost any urge to cause violence and provoke others. Now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and lack of communication with other people. The overseers note that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los convictos a los que se extirpó parte del cerebro perdieron todo impulso de usar la violencia y provocar a los demás. Ahora encuentran un placer silencioso en el trabajo monótono y la carencia de comunicación con otras personas. Los supervisores consideran el experimento un gran éxito.{/n}

languages.text: {n}脳を分析された囚人たちは、暴力を振るったり他人を挑発したりする衝動が起こらなくなった。今では、彼らは単調な仕事や他人とのコミュニケーションを取らずに済むことを喜んでいる。士官らは、この実験を大成功を収めた事例として注目した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The convicts who had their brains excised lost any urge to cause violence and provoke others. Now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and lack of communication with other people. The overseers note that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}脳を分析された奴隷たちは、暴力を振るったり他人を挑発したりする衝動が起こらなくなった。今では、彼らは単調な仕事や他人とのコミュニケーションを取らずに済むことを喜んでいる。士官らは、この実験を大成功を収めた事例として注目した。{/n}
{n}脳を分析された奴隷たちは、暴力を振るったり他人を挑発したりする衝動が起こらなくなった。今では、彼らは単調な仕事や他人とのコミュニケーションを取らずに済むことを喜んでいる。士官らは、この実験を大成功を収めた事例として注目した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les détenus ayant subi une excision cérébrale perdent toute velléité de se montrer violents et de provoquer les autres. Désormais, ils trouvent un plaisir tranquille dans un travail monotone et ne communiquent avec personne. D'après les contremaîtres, l'expérience est un succès retentissant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The convicts who had their brains excised lost any urge to cause violence and provoke others. Now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and lack of communication with other people. The overseers note that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les détenus ayant subi une excision cérébrale perdent toute velléité de se montrer violents et de provoquer les autres. Désormais, ils trouvent un plaisir tranquille dans un travail monotone et ne communiquent avec personne. D'après les contremaîtres, l'expérience est un succès retentissant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Sträflinge, deren Gehirne entfernt wurden, haben jedes Verlangen verloren, Gewalt auszuüben und andere zu provozieren. Sie finden nun ruhiges Vergnügen in monotoner Arbeit und der Vermeidung jeder Kommunikation mit anderen. Die Aufseher hielten im Protokoll fest, dass das Experiment äußerst erfolgreich gewesen war.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The convicts who had their brains excised lost any urge to cause violence and provoke others. Now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and lack of communication with other people. The overseers note that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}

{n}Die Sklaven, deren Gehirne seziert wurden, haben jedes Verlangen verloren, Gewalt auszuüben und andere zu provozieren. Sie finden nun ruhiges Vergnügen in monotoner Arbeit und der Vermeidung jeder Kommunikation mit anderen. Die Offiziere hielten im Protokoll fest, dass das Experiment äußerst erfolgreich gewesen war.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Beyin operasyonu geçiren hükümlüler, şiddete ve diğer mahkûmları kışkırtmaya yönelik eğilimlerini yitirmişlerdi. Artık tekdüze işlerle sessiz sedasız uğraşmaktan zevk alıyor, diğer şahıslarla hiç iletişim kurmuyorlardı. Gözetmenler, deneyin son derece başarılı olduğunu belirtti.{/n}
